trans-unit.source: Computes aggregates over a sequence of Int32 values.
trans-unit.target: 对一个 Int32 值序列计算聚合。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see langword="Int32" /> that identifies a group of items to average, such as a column in a table.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="Int32" /> 类型的值，该值标识要计算平均值的一组项（如表中的某列）。

trans-unit.source: Finds the average of a sequence of Int32 values.
trans-unit.target: 查找 Int32 值序列的平均值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the average result of a sequence of Int32 values.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Int32 值序列的平均值。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="Int32" /> value that contains the average result of a sequence of <see langword="Int32" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="Int32" /> 值，该值包含 <see langword="Int32" /> 值序列的平均值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a sequence of <see langword="Int32" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see langword="Int32" /> 值的序列。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value that indicates if the sequence is empty.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，该值指示该序列是否为空。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the sequence is empty, otherwise returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该序列为空，则返回 <see langword="true" />；否则返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see langword="Int32" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="Int32" /> 类型的值。

trans-unit.source: Assigns the <paramref name="value" /> parameter to the existing result if the <paramref name="value" /> parameter is greater than the existing result.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 参数大于现有结果，则将 <paramref name="value" /> 参数赋给现有结果。

trans-unit.source: Returns the largest value in a sequence of <see langword="Int32" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see langword="Int32" /> 值序列中的最大值。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="Int32" /> value that contains the maximum value in a sequence of <see langword="Int32" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="Int32" /> 值，该值包含 <see langword="Int32" /> 值序列中的最大值。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see langword="Int32" />
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="Int32" /> 类型的值

trans-unit.source: Assigns the <paramref name="value" /> parameter to the existing result if the <paramref name="value" /> parameter is less than the existing result.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 参数小于现有结果，则将 <paramref name="value" /> 参数赋给现有结果。

trans-unit.source: Returns the smallest value in a sequence of Int32 values.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Int32 值序列中的最小值。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="Int32" /> value that contains the minimum value in a sequence of <see langword="Int32" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="Int32" /> 值，该值包含 <see langword="Int32" /> 值序列中的最小值。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see langword="Int32" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="Int32" /> 类型的值。

trans-unit.source: Adds an <see langword="Int32" /> value to the existing result.
trans-unit.target: 向现有结果添加 <see langword="Int32" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the sum of a sequence of Int32 values.
trans-unit.target: 返回 Int32 值序列之和。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="Int32" /> value that contains the sum of a sequence of <see langword="Int32" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="Int32" /> 值，该值包含 <see langword="Int32" /> 值序列之和。
